Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds great value to us, with an internal valuation of $120. I am confident it will bring similar satisfaction to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $110 for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the excellence firsthand. Please let me know if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
